name: steel-gem
effect: Held : When the holder uses a damaging steel-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.
short_effect: Held: When the holder uses a damaging steel-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.

flavor_text.x-y: A gem with an essence of steel. When held, it strengthens the power of a Steel-type move one time.
